frontmatter.title: Python Meta-Programming with APIs
frontmatter.description: Meta-programming techniques can help turn some very ugly, repetative code into simple, beautiful code that is considerably easier to use. This article will show the application of some basic python meta-programming techniques and how they were used to put a pythonic interface atop an obviously java based API.
